name: Tale Of The Dark Age
description:
Tale Of The Dark Age is a medieval 3D adventure platformer in which you get out of the dungeon, overcoming many dangers on your way. The plot of the game revolves around the sorceress Amaraynt, the representative of the ancient secret magic order, which was caught by witch hunters and abandoned the dungeon. The sorceress, under your control, has to get out of the dungeon, fighting with monsters and passing through dangerous traps.

Supported languages:

-English

-Russian

-Ukrainian
